Priest of Dawn: "[Seal of Strife]" If we control the Seal of Strife, the rules of a castle siege will be changed as follows: "Strong Defensive Mercenaries::" The lord of each castle can employ strong defensive mercenaries whom they usually not allowed to hire. "Increased Castle Gate and Wall Defenses:" The defensive power of the castle gates and walls are slightly increased. "Decreased Cost of Castle Gate and Wall Upgrades:" The cost to upgrade the castle gates and walls is decreased. "Change Restart Village:" If those who have no position die, they will revive in the 2nd nearest village, not the nearest one, when they restart. "Prohibit Siege Weapons:" During a castle siege, the Dusk side will be unable to use siege weapons.
"Additional Benefits:"
"Tax Rate Increases:" The limit of the maximum tax rate that can be imposed by the lord of each castle is increased. "Change in CP:" Combat Spirit Points (CP) of all Dawn members increases by 10%, while CP of all Dusk members decreases by 10%.
"Disadvantages when the Seal is Stolen:"
"Wyvern Riding Prohibited:" During the available period of the seal, "the lord is not allowed to ride a Wyvern". "Cancel Defending Clan's Registration:" During a castle siege, participation of all clans except for the clan that owns the castle is canceled.
